sentence.Network_en: He died at Holly Hall, his wife's family home.
sentence.Network_cn: 他在妻子的娘家冬青府去世。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English holi, shortened form of Old English holegn, holen, of Germanic origin; related to German Hulst

encyclopedia.content: 基本信息 【种名】：冬青 【学名】：Ilex purpurea Hassk. 【科名】：植物界 种子植物门(Spermatophyta).被子植物亚门(Angiospermae). 卫矛目(Celastrales) 冬青科(Aquifoliaceae) 冬青属(Ilex) 冬青种(I. pubescens Hook. et Arn.) 释名：北寄生、槲寄生、桑寄生、柳寄生、黄寄生、冻青、寄生子 气味：（子及木皮）甘、苦、凉、无毒。详细介绍 冬青在古代称槲寄，它生出自《新修本草》载：“此多生槲、榉、柳、水杨、枫等树上，

entry.def: Holly is an evergreen tree or shrub which has hard, shiny leaves with sharp points, and red berries in winter.

means.word_mean: 1. any tree or shrub of the genus Ilex having red berries and shiny evergreen leaves with prickly edges
